TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void VolumeChangedHandler(object o, VolumeChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed VolumeChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the VolumeChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the VolumeChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the VolumeChangedHandler is removed from the event.
